net.jawr.web.config.jmx

Class JawrApplicationConfigManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jawr.web.config.jmx.JawrApplicationConfigManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JawrApplicationConfigManagerMBean

    public class JawrApplicationConfigManager
extends Object
implements JawrApplicationConfigManagerMBean
    This interface defines the MBean which manage the Jawr configuration for a we application, so it will affect all JawrConfigManagerMBean associated to Jawr Servlets.
    Author:
    Ibrahim Chaehoi

      • addDebugSessionId

        public void addDebugSessionId(String sessionId)
        Description copied from interface: JawrApplicationConfigManagerMBean
        Add a session ID, to the set of debug session ID. All request make by sessions where their IDs is contained in the debug session Set, will be threated as in debug mode.
        Specified by:
        addDebugSessionId in interface JawrApplicationConfigManagerMBean
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session ID to add
